a.title: Imaging study model includes the key information about the content of an imaging study. It does not include image pixels but includes location pointers to its image content and organises this information according to the well-established model of an imaging study made of one or more series and each series made of instances or images. Composed of a set of data (DICOM KOS) that facilitates the location of all available images.

a.title: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: Imaging study model includes the key information about the content of an imaging study. It does not include image pixels but includes location pointers to its image content and organises this information according to the well-established model of an imaging study made of one or more series and each series made of instances or images. Composed of a set of data (DICOM KOS) that facilitates the location of all available images.

short.value: Imaging study model

definition.value: Imaging study model includes the key information about the content of an imaging study. It does not include image pixels but includes location pointers to its image content and organises this information according to the well-established model of an imaging study made of one or more series and each series made of instances or images. Composed of a set of data (DICOM KOS) that facilitates the location of all available images.

short.value: Basic metadata for this information

definition.value: Basic metadata for this information

short.value: Patient/subject information

definition.value: Patient/subject information

short.value: Identifiers for the imaging study such as DICOM Study Instance UID. If one or more series elements are present in the imaging study, then there shall be one DICOM Study UID identifier.

definition.value: Business identifier for the object, unique within its system. Supporting disambiguation between different contexts (systems/countries).

short.value: Author(s) responsible for the provided information.

definition.value: Author(s) responsible for the provided information. The exact role of the responsible author varies across use cases and is specific to individual models.

short.value: Date and optionally time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and optionally time of authoring/issuing

short.value: Status of the resource or document

definition.value: Status of the resource or document

short.value: Source of information (e.g. patient, patient's proxy). Used in case the patient has authored the information or the author has submitted patient-stated information.

definition.value: Source of information (e.g. patient, patient's proxy). Used in case the patient has authored the information or the author has submitted patient-stated information.

short.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

short.value: All of the distinct values for series' modalities

definition.value: All of the distinct values for series' modalities

short.value: All of the distinct values for series' examined body parts.

definition.value: All of the distinct values for series' examined body parts.

short.value: Reference to the encounter with which this imaging study is associated

definition.value: Reference to the encounter with which this imaging study is associated

short.value: Date and time the study started.

definition.value: Date and time the study started.

short.value: References to the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

definition.value: References to the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

short.value: Number of series in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.

definition.value: Number of series in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.

short.value: Number of service-object pair (SOP) instances in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.

definition.value: Number of service-object pair (SOP) instances in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.

short.value: The imaging manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the study (component) performed.

definition.value: The imaging manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the study (component) performed.

short.value: Organisation name, address, contact information.

definition.value: Organisation name, address, contact information.

short.value: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

definition.value: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

short.value: Series. Each study has one or more series of instances, but they may be absent when no series information needs to be conveyed

definition.value: Series. Each study has one or more series of instances, but they may be absent when no series information needs to be conveyed

short.value: DICOM Series Instance UID for the series

definition.value: DICOM Series Instance UID for the series

short.value: Numeric identifier of this series

definition.value: Numeric identifier of this series

short.value: Acquisition modality - the modality used for this series

definition.value: Acquisition modality - the modality used for this series

short.value: A short human readable summary of the series

definition.value: A short human readable summary of the series

short.value: Number of series related instances

definition.value: Number of series related instances

short.value: Series endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

definition.value: Series endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

short.value: Body part (with laterality) examined

definition.value: Body part (with laterality) examined

short.value: Specimen imaged

definition.value: Specimen imaged

short.value: When the series started

definition.value: When the series started

short.value: Each series has one or more instances, but they may be absent when no instance information needs to be conveyed

definition.value: Each series has one or more instances, but they may be absent when no instance information needs to be conveyed

short.value: Instance title that is the description of the instance.

definition.value: Instance title that is the description of the instance.

short.value: DICOM SOP Instance UID

definition.value: DICOM SOP Instance UID

short.value: Imaging study model

definition.value: Imaging study model includes the key information about the content of an imaging study. It does not include image pixels but includes location pointers to its image content and organises this information according to the well-established model of an imaging study made of one or more series and each series made of instances or images. Composed of a set of data (DICOM KOS) that facilitates the location of all available images.

short.value: Identifiers for the imaging study such as DICOM Study Instance UID. If one or more series elements are present in the imaging study, then there shall be one DICOM Study UID identifier.
All of the distinct values for series' modalities

definition.value: All of the distinct values for series' modalities

short.value: All of the distinct values for series' examined body parts.

definition.value: All of the distinct values for series' examined body parts.

short.value: Reference to the encounter with which this imaging study is associated

definition.value: Reference to the encounter with which this imaging study is associated

short.value: Date and time the study started.

definition.value: Date and time the study started.

short.value: References to the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

definition.value: References to the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

short.value: Number of series in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.

definition.value: Number of series in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.

short.value: Number of service-object pair (SOP) instances in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.

definition.value: Number of service-object pair (SOP) instances in the study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.

short.value: The imaging manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the study (component) performed.

definition.value: The imaging manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the study (component) performed.

short.value: Organisation name, address, contact information.

definition.value: Organisation name, address, contact information.

short.value: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

definition.value: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

short.value: Series. Each study has one or more series of instances, but they may be absent when no series information needs to be conveyed
